SEARCH
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.balakin.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.balakin.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements Impler, JarImpler
This class provides implementation for the Impler and JarImpler interfaces. It allows generating implementations for interfaces and packing them into a JAR file.
Author:
DmitryBalakin

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to run the Implementor class. It expects command line arguments specifying either:
      • The fully qualified name of the interface to implement.
      • The option "-jar" followed by the fully qualified name of the interface to implement and the path to save the JAR file.
      Parameters:
      args - Array containing [class-name] or [-jar, class-name, path-to-jar.jar].

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Implements the specified interface by generating a corresponding class file. The implementation class will contain default implementations for all abstract methods declared in the interface.
      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - the interface token to implement.
      root - the root directory where the implementation class file will be generated.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if the specified interface token is null, is a private interface, or if the root path is null, or if an error occurs during file writing.

    • write

      private void write(String res, Writer wr) throws IOException
      Writes the specified string with Unicode escapes to the writer.
      Parameters:
      res - The string to write.
      wr - The writer to write to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • makePath

      private Path makePath(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Creates the path for the generated Java source file.
      Parameters:
      token - The interface for which the implementation is generated.
      root - The root directory.
      Returns:
      The path to the generated Java source file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - If the directory cannot be created.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Implements the specified interface and creates a JAR file containing the implementation class.
      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - the interface token to implement.
      jarFile - the path to the JAR file to be created.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if unable to implement the interface, compile the implementation class, create the JAR file, or due to security restrictions.

    • getPath

      private String getPath(String path, char separator)
      Returns the path string with separators replaced.
      Parameters:
      path - The original path.
      separator - The separator character to replace.
      Returns:
      The path string with separators replaced.

    • createJar

      private void createJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile, Path tmp) throws ImplerException
      Creates a JAR file with the implementation of the given interface.
      Parameters:
      token - The interface to implement.
      jarFile - The JAR file to create.
      tmp - The temporary directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - If the JAR file cannot be created.

    • getCode

      private Path getCode(Class<?> token, Path tmp) throws URISyntaxException
      Returns the source path for the given class.
      Parameters:
      token - The class.
      tmp - The temporary directory.
      Returns:
      The source path for the class.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URI syntax is incorrect.

    • compClasses

      private int compClasses(Class<?> token, Path path, Path tmp) throws URISyntaxException, ImplerException
      Compiles the class.
      Parameters:
      token - The class.
      path - The path to the class file.
      tmp - The temporary directory.
      Returns:
      The exit code of the compilation process.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If the URI syntax is incorrect.
      ImplerException - If the Java compiler not found.
